description: Contact Form - Let visitors send messages to the site admin

userStories.title: Create contact_messages migration and model
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to store contact form submissions in the database.
acceptanceCriteria: Migration creates contact_messages table with name, email, subject, message, and timestamps
ContactMessage model has fillable fields and factory

userStories.title: Create ContactRequest form validation
userStories.description: As a developer, I need server-side validation for contact form submissions.
acceptanceCriteria: ContactRequest validates name (required, max:255), email (required, email), subject (required, max:255), message (required)
Invalid submissions return 422 with field-specific errors

userStories.title: Create ContactController and routes
userStories.description: As a visitor, I want to submit the contact form and see confirmation.
acceptanceCriteria: POST /contact stores message and redirects with success flash

userStories.title: Send admin notification on contact submission
userStories.description: As an admin, I want to receive an email when someone submits the contact form.
acceptanceCriteria: ContactSubmitted notification created with toMail method
Notification dispatched after successful form submission
Email contains sender name, email, subject, and message
